languages.text: "Я слышал, что и вам пришлось столкнуться с {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}несправедливостью{/d} и злыми языками. Надеюсь, что о вас перестанут судить по былым ошибкам раньше, чем через пару веков". {n}Монтэг сочувственно улыбается.{/n}

"I hear that you too have had to deal with {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}injustice{/d} and badmouthing in your time. I hope people will stop judging you for your past mistakes in less than a couple of centuries." {n}Einrich gives you a sympathetic smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я слышал, что и вам пришлось столкнуться с {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}несправедливостью{/d} и злыми языками. Надеюсь, что о вас перестанут судить по былым ошибкам раньше, чем через пару веков". {n}Монтэг сочувственно улыбается.{/n}

"I hear that you too have had to deal with {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}injustice{/d} and badmouthing in your time. I hope people will stop judging you for your past mistakes in less than a couple of centuries." {n}Einrich gives you a sympathetic smile.{/n}

languages.text: "Wie ich höre, hattet Ihr zu Eurer Zeit ebenfalls mit {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}Ungerechtigkeit{/d} und Verleumdung zu kämpfen. Ich hoffe, die Leute hören in ein paar Jahrhunderten auf, Euch nach vergangenen Fehlern zu beurteilen." {n}Einrich lächelt dich freundlich an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hear that you too have had to deal with {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}injustice{/d} and badmouthing in your time. I hope people will stop judging you for your past mistakes in less than a couple of centuries." {n}Einrich gives you a sympathetic smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wie ich höre, hattet Ihr zu Eurer Zeit ebenfalls mit {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}Ungerechtigkeit{/d} und Verleumdung zu kämpfen. Ich hoffe, die Leute hören in ein paar Jahrhunderten auf, Euch nach vergangenen Fehlern zu beurteilen." {n}Einrich lächelt dich freundlich an.{/n}

languages.text: « On raconte que vous avez vous aussi été victime d'une {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}injustice{/d} et de calomnies en votre temps. J'espère que les gens cesseront de vous juger pour vos erreurs passées avant le prochain siècle. » {n}Einrich vous adresse un sourire compatissant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hear that you too have had to deal with {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}injustice{/d} and badmouthing in your time. I hope people will stop judging you for your past mistakes in less than a couple of centuries." {n}Einrich gives you a sympathetic smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « On raconte que vous avez vous aussi été victime d'une {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}injustice{/d} et de calomnies en votre temps. J'espère que les gens cesseront de vous juger pour vos erreurs passées avant le prochain siècle. » {n}Einrich vous adresse un sourire compatissant.{/n}

languages.text: «Tengo entendido que usted también ha tenido que afrontar ciertas {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}injusticias{/d} y calumnias en el pasado. Espero que en un par de siglos la gente deje de juzgarle por sus errores previos». {n}Einrich te ofrece una sonrisa solidaria.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hear that you too have had to deal with {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}injustice{/d} and badmouthing in your time. I hope people will stop judging you for your past mistakes in less than a couple of centuries." {n}Einrich gives you a sympathetic smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tengo entendido que usted también ha tenido que afrontar ciertas {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}injusticias{/d} y calumnias en el pasado. Espero que en un par de siglos la gente deje de juzgarle por sus errores previos». {n}Einrich te ofrece una sonrisa solidaria.{/n}

languages.text: 「あなたの頃も、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}不正{/d}や悪評に悩まれていたとお聞きしています。数世紀のうちに人民が過去の過ちであなたを評価しなくなることを願っていますよ」{n}アインリッヒが同情するような笑みを向けてくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hear that you too have had to deal with {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}injustice{/d} and badmouthing in your time. I hope people will stop judging you for your past mistakes in less than a couple of centuries." {n}Einrich gives you a sympathetic smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの頃も、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}不正{/d}や悪評に悩まれていたとお聞きしています。数世紀のうちに人民が過去の過ちであなたを評価しなくなることを願っていますよ」{n}アインリッヒが同情するような笑みを向けてくる。{/n}

languages.text: “我听说您在您之前的日子里，也曾面对{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}不公{/d}与他人的污蔑。我只希望用不了几百年，人们就不再会由于您过去的错误而评判您。”{n}艾因里奇对你报以同情的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hear that you too have had to deal with {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}injustice{/d} and badmouthing in your time. I hope people will stop judging you for your past mistakes in less than a couple of centuries." {n}Einrich gives you a sympathetic smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我听说您在您之前的日子里，也曾面对{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}不公{/d}与他人的污蔑。我只希望用不了几百年，人们就不再会由于您过去的错误而评判您。”{n}艾因里奇对你报以同情的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: "Duyduğuma göre siz de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}adaletsizlik{/d} ve kötü söylentiler nedeniyle sorunlar yaşamak durumunda kalmışsınız. Umarım insanlar, geçmiş hatalarınız için sizi yargılamayı bir iki yüzyıl geçmeden bırakır." {n}Einrich, anlayışlı bir şekilde sana gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hear that you too have had to deal with {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}injustice{/d} and badmouthing in your time. I hope people will stop judging you for your past mistakes in less than a couple of centuries." {n}Einrich gives you a sympathetic smile.{/n}
